name: Color Catch - Minimalist Arcade Action
description:
Color Catch is a reflex-driven, minimalist arcade game with one-touch controls

Tap the left or right side of the screen to spin your color wheel.
Match the falling circles with the correct color on your wheel as many times as you can as the game play gets faster and more challenging with each point you earn.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
● Fast & infinite play/replay game play
● An addictive, fast paced, and never ending score-chaser challenge
● Minimalist Graphics
● Easy to learn One Touch Controls
● Leader board.
